xml_archive_exception.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_XML_ARCHIVE_EXCEPTION_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_XML_ARCHIVE_EXCEPTION_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 // xml_archive_exception.hpp:
00011

00018 
00019 #include <exception>
00020 #include <cassert>
00021 
00022 #include <boost/archive/archive_exception.hpp>
00023 
00024 namespace boost {
00025 namespace archive {
00026 
00028 // exceptions thrown by xml archives
00029 //
00030 class xml_archive_exception : 
00031     public virtual archive_exception
00032 {
00033 public:
00034     typedef enum {
00035         xml_archive_parsing_error,    // see save_register
00036         xml_archive_tag_mismatch,
00037         xml_archive_tag_name_error
00038     } exception_code;
00039     exception_code code;
00040     xml_archive_exception(exception_code)
00041     {}
00042     virtual const char *what( ) const throw( )
00043     {
00044         const char *msg;
00045         switch(code){
00046         case xml_archive_parsing_error:
00047             msg = "unrecognized XML syntax";
00048             break;
00049         case xml_archive_tag_mismatch:
00050             msg = "XML start/end tag mismatch";
00051             break;
00052         case xml_archive_tag_name_error:
00053             msg = "Invalid XML tag name";
00054             break;
00055         default:
00056             msg = archive_exception::what();
00057             break;
00058         }
00059         return msg;
00060     }
00061 };
00062 
00063 }// namespace archive
00064 }// namespace boost
00065 
00066 #endif //BOOST_XML_ARCHIVE_ARCHIVE_EXCEPTION_HPP
